The valence feature is still buggy. See:

https://sourceforge.net/tracker/?func=detail&aid=995441&group_id=73833&atid=539099

Fixing this is waiting for other Frontier reworkings to complete.

Also, be sure you set all politeness delays (min-delay, delay-factor) to zero --
otherwise the mechanism for parallel fetches and the mechanism for politeness delays
will be working at cross-purposes with undefined results.

Especially if you are local to a site, a valence > 1 may not offer much
benefit over simply zeroing out the politeness delays.

- Gordon
